Articles.Content:
So when will we be able to do this?

Please note that I mostly kid.

Edited April 18, 2014 by BenHR
With appropriate invocation of the Kraken, now I believe. You could probably simulate the effect with mods too.
i've gone so far as to park a couple of space station modules on my captured asteroid
Its already there. In the story it says it was built in the 1950s.

Its already there. In the story it says it was built in the 1950s.

So many hours of my childhood wasted trying to S rank every mission, never to succeed, and I never picked up on this? I dumped more hours into this than I have KSP so far and yet I can pick up how to play this and miss simple details like that in what I consider a childhood gem. Huh, I must like KSP more than I thought
S rank? I swear that game only went up to A. And parhaps replaying levels and their variants means you only played through the story in whole a few times?
